' name: individualUpdate ' purpose: Update status and lifecycles for individual project. ' created: 5-MAY-2005 Yuri Delyamba ' (c) Copyright by Aras Corporation, 2005-2007.
'inDom format: ' <Item type='Method' action='individualUpdate'> ' <project_item><Item type='Project' id='PROJECT_ID_VAL'/></project_item> ' </Item> ' OR ' <Item type='Project' id='PROJECT_ID_VAL'> ' .... ' </Item>
Dim tmpInn As Innovator = Me.getInnovator() Dim q As Item = tmpInn.newItem("tmp", "tmp") Dim r As Item Dim tmpNd As XmlElement = Me.node If tmpNd.getAttribute("type")="Method" Then tmpNd = CType(tmpNd.selectSingleNode("project_item/Item"), XmlElement) If IsNothing(tmpNd) Then Return tmpInn.newError("Invalid input format.") End If tmpNd = CCO.Xml.GetResponseItem(CCO.GetItem.GetItemById("Project", tmpNd.getAttribute("id"), 0, "", "id,state,project_number,wbs_id,locked_by_id")) If tmpNd Is Nothing Then Return tmpInn.newError("Cannot get project") End If End If Dim projectItem As XmlElement = tmpNd Dim wbsID As String = CCO.XML.GetItemProperty(projectItem,"wbs_id") Dim projectId As String = projectItem.getAttribute("id")
r = tmpInn.applyMethod("Check,Setup Project For Update", String.Format("<project_item>{0}</project_item>", projectItem.OuterXml)) If r.isError() Then Return r
r = tmpInn.applyMethod("Unlock Project Tree", String.Format("<body top_wbs_id='{0}'/>", System.Security.SecurityElement.Escape(wbsID))) If r.isError() Then Return r
r = tmpInn.applyMethod("Promote Project Activities", String.Format("<body top_wbs_id='{0}'/>", System.Security.SecurityElement.Escape(wbsID))) If r.isError() Then Return r
r = tmpInn.applyMethod("Project Rollup", String.Format("<body project_id='{0}'/>", System.Security.SecurityElement.Escape(projectId))) If r.isError() Then Return r
Return tmpInn.newResult("ok")
